---
# Source: chart-with-alt-delim/templates/alt-configmap.yaml
# helm: delim=[,]
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: alt-delim-chart-with-alt-delim-alt
data:
  myvalue: "Hello {{world}}"
---
# Source: chart-with-alt-delim/templates/normal-configmap.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: alt-delim-chart-with-alt-delim-normal
data:
  myvalue: "Hello world"
